Translations.Text: Ani tya divasi amhi tyanna apasata ekamekansi misalata asatana soduna de'u ani sura (sankha) phunkala ja'ila, maga sarvanna amhi ekaca veli jama karu
Ani tya divasi amhi jahannamala (dekhila) kaphirancya samora anuna ubhi karu
Jyance dole majhya smaranapasuna padadyata hote ani (satya) aikuhi sakata navhate
Kaya kaphira ha vicara karuna basale aheta ki majhyasivaya te majhya dasanna apala samarthaka banavuna ghetila? (Aika) amhi tara tya kaphirancya pahunacarasathi jahannama tayara karuna thevali ahe
Sanga ki (tumhi sangata asala) tara mi sangato ki apalya karmammule sarvanta jasta nukasana ucalanara kona ahe
Te loka aheta, jyance aihika jivanace sarva prayatna vyartha tharale, ani te yaca bhramata rahile ki te phara cangale kama karita aheta

Heca te loka hote, jyanni apalya palanakartya (allaha) cya ayatinsi ani tyacyasi bheta honyaca inkara kela, yastava tyanci sarva karme vaya gelita. Maga kayamatacya divasi amhi tyanca kasalahi bhara niscita karanara nahi
Vastutah tyanca mobadala jahannama ahe, karana tyanni inkara kela ani majhya ayatinci ani majhya paigambaranci thatta udavili
Jya lokanni imana rakhale ani satkarma karita rahile, niscitaca tyancyasathi phirdosa1 (jannatamadhila sarvocca sthana) cya bagammadhye svagata ahe
Jithe te nehami rahatila, je sthana badalanyaca kadhihi tyanca irada honara nahi

Sanga ki jara majhya palanakartyacya gosti (prasansa va gunagana) lihinyakarita samudra sa'i banala tara tohi majhya palanakartyacya gosti sampanyapurvica sampuna ja'ila, maga vatalyasa amhi tyasarakhaca dusara (samudra) tyacya madatikarita ghe'una yave

Tumhi sanga ki mi tara tumacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe (hoya)majhyakade vahyi(prakasana)keli jate ki sarvanca upasya kevala ekaca upasya ahe, tara jyala dekhila apalya palanakartyasi bhetanyaci asa asela, tyane satkarma karita rahile pahije, ani apalya palanakartyacya bhakti-upasaneta1 dusarya konalahi sahabhagi karu naye
Kapha. Ha. Ya. Eaina. Svada
Ha ullekha ahe tumacya palanakartyacya tya krpeca, ji tyane apale dasa jakariyavara keli hoti
Jevha tyanni apalya palanakartyajavala gupacupa ritya prarthana keli
Mhanale he majhya palanakartya majhi hade kamakuvata jhali aheta ani doke mhatarapanamule bhadakale ahe, parantu mi kadhihi tujhyajavala du'a (prarthana) karuna vancita rahilo nahi
Ani mala apalya (mrtyu) nantara, apalya javalacya nateva'ikance bhaya ahe. Majhi patni dekhila vanjha ahe, pana tarihi tu mala apalyatarphe varasa pradana kara
Jo majhahi varasa asela ani yakubacya vansacahi varasa, ani he majhya palanakartya! Tu tyala apala avadata dasa banava
He jakariya! Amhi tumhala eka putra (cya prapti) ci khusakhabara deto, jyace nava yahaya ahe. Amhi tyancyapurvi ya navasarakhe nava konalahi dile nahi
(Jakariya) mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Mala putra kasa bare ho'ila, majhi patni vanjha ani mi svatah mhatarapanacya atisaya kamakuvata avasthesa pohocalo ahe
Adesa jhala ki (vayada) asaca prakare purna jhala. Tumacya palanakartyane pharmavile ahe ki majhyakarita tara he agadi sope ahe ani tumhi svatah jevha kahica navhata, mi tumhala nirmana kele ahe

(Jakariya) mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Majhyasathi ekhadi nisani nirdharita kara, adesa dila ki tumacyasathi nisani hi ki prakrti dhadadhakata asatanahi tumhi tina ratri paryanta konatyahi manasasi bolu sakanara nahita
Ata jakariya apalya kholi (hujarya) cya bahera ye'una apalya janasamuhajavala ye'una tyanna isara karatata ki tumhi sakala-sandhyakala allahaci pavitrata varnana kara
He yahaya! (Majhya) granthavara apali pakada majabuta rakha ani amhi yahayala balapanapasunaca jnana pradana kele
Ani apalyakaduna daya-krpa ani pavitrata dekhila, to allahace bhaya rakhuna vaganara manusya hota
Ani apalya mata-pityasi neka-sadacari hota, to kathora ani gunhegara navhata
Tyacyavara salamati ahe, jya divasi tyane janma ghetala ani jya divasi to marana pavela, ani jya divasi to jivanta karuna uthavila ja'ila
Ya granthata mariyamacya vrttantacahi ullekha kara, jevha tyanni apalya kutumbacya lokampasuna vegale ho'una purvekade ekantavasa patkarala
Ani tya lokampasuna ada-padada kela, maga amhi ticyajavala apala atma (jibrila ale.) Pathavila, tara to ticyasamora sampurna manava rupata prakata jhala
Ti mhanali, mi tujhyapasuna rahamana (dayavana allaha) ce sarana magate, jara tu thodasahi allahace bhaya rakhanara ahesa
To mhanala, mi allahatarphe pathavila gelela rasula (presita) ahe, tula eka pavitra putra denyasathi alo ahe
Ti mhanali, mala putra kasa bare ho'u sakato? Mala tara ekhadya purusaca hata dekhila lagala nahi, ani na mi duracari ahe

To mhanala, pharmana tara heca ahe. (Parantu) tumacya palanakartyaca adesa ahe ki te majhyasathi pharaca sope ahe. Amhi tara tyala lokansathi eka nisani1 banavu ani apali khasa daya hi tara eka niscita asi gosta ahe
